entry.data:
CLEAR, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
COLD WITH LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 10 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 10 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS ZERO AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
